column2: Waymo a fully autonomous driving technology company and a consolidated VIE received 5.6 billion in funding

column1: during the year ended December 31 2024 the majority of which was funded by Alphabet. Investments from external
parties were accounted for as equity transactions and resulted in recognition of noncontrolling interests.

column2: As  of  December  31  2023  and  2024  total  noncontrolling  interests  NCI  in  our  consolidated  subsidiaries  were

column1: 3.4 billion and 4.2 billion respectively of which 1.1 billion was redeemable noncontrolling interests RNCI for both
periods.  NCI  and  RNCI  are  included  within  additional  paid-in  capital.  Net  loss  attributable  to  noncontrolling  interests
was not material for any period presented and is included within the "other" component of OI&E. See Note 7 for further
details on OI&E.
Unconsolidated VIEs

column2: We have investments in VIEs in which we are not the primary beneficiary. These VIEs include private companies

column1: that  are  primarily  early  stage  companies  and  certain  renewable  energy  entities  in  which  activities  involve  power
generation using renewable sources.

column2: We have determined that the governance structures of these entities do not allow us to direct the activities that

column1: would significantly affect their economic performance. Therefore we are not the primary beneficiary and the results of
operations and financial position of these VIEs are not included in our consolidated financial statements. We account
for these investments primarily as non-marketable equity securities or equity method investments which are included

within

investments were 1.7 billion and 1.5 billion respectively.
